title: dodging needs an actual punishment
body:
So in the past couple of weeks queue dodging has started to happen a lot more than it used to and it's getting pathetic.
iv had instances were iv been in queue for 20 mins after 10 dodges in a row, whether its my team because they didn't get their favourite position or the enemy team it shouldn't happen. It needs an actual punishment such as a 1 hour ban that progressively gets longer the more you dodge and not just 5 minutes. please sort this out.

Hey man,

PENALTIES
**SOLO RANKED QUEUE**
1 queue dodge: 6 minute queue penalty. Lose 3 LP.
2+ queue dodges: 30 minute queue penalty. Lose 10 LP.
**TEAM RANKED QUEUE**
1 queue dodge: 1 minute queue penalty. Lose 10 LP.
2+ queue dodges: 60 minute queue penalty. Lose 10 LP.
**CLASSIC (NORMAL) QUEUE**
1 queue dodge: 6 minute queue penalty.
2+ queue dodges: 15 minute queue penalty.
**ARAM QUEUE**
1 queue dodge: 15 minute penalty. Lose all used rerolls.
2+ queue dodges: 30 minute penalty. Lose all used rerolls.
Dodging in any promotional series will count as a loss. The series will end if it is the determining loss.

If a player dodges in a normal game and then dodges in a ranked game, the penalty for the ranked dodge will be the same as if there were two dodges.

You can read more about it on our support site - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging
I have lost a re roll on more then one occasion to someone else dodging, so frustrating.
Having a good "dodge" game is the key to climbing though. Knowing when to take the 3LP hit is very important if you wish to climb quickly.

Worst idea for this game I've ever heard. Vote to kick is actually reasonable if 4 other members agree to it (for ranked queues only), but there is absolutely no reason to increase dodge timers when they are bad enough already. Just checked your profile and you're unranked, so you're complaining about normal games, which is sort of just ridiculous. A 6 minute wait is a pretty fair consequence for someone that either, had something to do really quickly that would take 5 minutes (god that came out wrong), or they don't want to waste 40 minutes playing a champion in a normal when they probably only queued up to play that champion.
